statistical_targets: Investigate differences in populism between early and late campaign stages (H₂)
curated_evidence.curation_instructions: Select high-quality quotes that provide strong evidence for the high overall populism score. Curate examples that are representative of the core populist dimensions as defined by the PDAF v10.0.2 framework. Pay special attention to sourcing quotes from both early and late campaign stages to enable comparative analysis related to H₂.
